message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You can't always get what you want, but I'll give you a better deal than splitting it evenly!
You're getting too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a better deal than that!
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm not falling for it. Meet me in the middle this time!
You're getting closer, Bob! But I'm not giving in yet. I'll make a small concession this time.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up my advantage yet!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob! I'll make a bigger concession this time. But don't think you're getting off that easy!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm willing to make a serious compromise to get this deal done.
You're getting close, Bob, but I'm not ready to surrender yet. I'll make one last stand!
